name: FYD
description: Plunge into the world where heroes always die, and villains triumph! Kill people who try to protect the good and stand in the way of achieving the goal of your whole life – to take over the world! But it’s rather difficult to subjugate even some pathetic country just by yourself...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 15 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
